author: daxian-dbw
body:
Quote from Jason's [comment](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/6708#discussion_r183563386) in #6708:

> In another PR - you could introduce names for each shared control to make the file more friendly to human editing now that we no longer use a tool to generate it.

Open this issue to track that work.
title: Clean up 'Help_format_ps1xml.cs' to not index into an array of shared controls
